meanings.sent1: The stapled papers were neatly organized in a folder.
meanings.sent2: She used a stapled document to show her research findings.
meanings.sent3: The stapled report made the meeting more interesting.
meanings.sent4: His stapled notes held the key to solving the puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The stapled pages fluttered in the wind like colorful butterflies.

meanings.sent1: She stapled the papers together for her presentation.
meanings.sent2: He carefully stapled the loose papers to keep them in order.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally stapled its tail to the paper - ouch!
meanings.sent4: His words stapled the memory in her mind forever.
meanings.sent5: The music stapled a smile on everyone's face during the party.

meanings.definition: having staples as a main feature
meanings.sent1: The stapled booklet contained all the necessary information.
meanings.sent2: The stapled brochure showcased the new products effectively.
meanings.sent3: The stapled design added a touch of elegance to the packaging.
meanings.sent4: Her stapled portfolio stood out among the rest.
meanings.sent5: The stapled banner caught the attention of passersby with its bold colors.
